message:
SYSTEM: Extending_ontology_engineering_practices.pdf: Página 7
Extending ontology engineering practices for ontology-based application development
Research Question - Hypothesis
7
§ RQ: Does the intended use cases of ontologies
facilitate ontology-based application development?
§ Hypothesis 1: The intended use cases of the 
ontology, defined during the specification activity, 
eases the understanding of Open Data usage.
§ Hypothesis 2: Ontology-based APIs facilitate 
Application Developers the ontology usage compared 
to other approaches.
§ Hypothesis 3: Ontology-based APIs improve ontology 
validation regarding its intended use cases.
speaker: SYSTEM
